txt.en: Derva has asked you to defeat wood-trolls and pick mushrooms.\n\nWood-trolls and the mushrooms she seeks can be found in the woods to the north-west.
Derva needs you to defeat wood-trolls and harvest mushrooms in the forest north-west of her farm.
TBD Thank you for getting me the things and hitting those guys

Derva brushes some woodchips and twigs from your shoulder.

'You had a little something on there. I take it the wood-trolls have been dealt with?'

You nod and hand over the basket of mushrooms. She lifts them to her nose and inhales.

'I've missed that musty smell. Thanks, adventurer. I hope your future journeys treat you well.'

'What we don't grow here we forage from the woods to the north-east. Or at least we used to until some wood-trolls moved in. They used to be fewer in number and stayed closer to the water. Something pushed them farther up hill and I don't know what.\n\n'Normally I would be happy to live and let live, but over the past few
